cause.description:
Waqfeyat Al Maadi Community Foundation is the first established Community Foundation in its real sense, in Egypt.
A Foundation per definition is based on the concept of ENDOWMENT (Waqf in its traditional sense), where funds are allocated in a financial vessel bearing interest to sustain operational costs of the organization for centuries and centuries to come. A Community Foundation is one that focuses its effort for the upgrading of a certain geographic area.
The foundation mainly aims at reviving and modernizing El Waqf as a traditional tool for organized social giving embedded in Egyptian history.
It provides an innovative sustainable model of Community Foundations that employ modern applications of El Waqf Endowments as a sustainable channel for mobilizing and channeling local resources towards sustainable local development of a given community.
In our case Waqfeyat Al Maadi is devising a number of Waqfs (Endowmnets) to serve specific needs of our targeted underprivilaged community in Al Maadi outskirts (El Bassateen, El Maasara, Torah, etc .
The Foundation also acts as a hub, pioneer, facilitator and catalyst for civil society organizations in adopting innovative and financially sustainable, participatory Models of Endowments or Waqfs.
SUPPORT OUR ENDOWMENT AND GIVE LIFE BACK TO A MODERN WAQF for Development.
